segmentosSRT.text: It's not good for the baby.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: All right, do it yourself. But please don't cry.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: You can't just win and walk away.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: We'll formalize the transfer in a few days...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: and explain to your old man.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I don't gamble now. Not even in my next life.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I'd like to borrow money to set up a shop.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I want to live. There's nothing like family.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
- Where'd you get them?
- Off the corpses.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: we sang for the Liberation Army.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Suppose I was singing for her, too.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
The new government
paid for mother's burial...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: She was fine when I left.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: This is our town leader, Mr. Niu.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I just dragged a cannon and sang opera.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
Sounds okay to me.
And I took part in the revolution.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
- What are you looking for?
- That certificate.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: It's good to be poor. Nothing like it.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: We're off to the next house.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing's not going to any stupid show.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: and blinds all who look within
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I yell there's no time to waste
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Far away, we flee with haste
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
He won't be able to sleep or eat
or ever take a dump...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Pack a lunchbox. I'll wake him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing, wake up. We're nearly there.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: put your dumplings in hot water.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Make sure you make them hot enough.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Cold dumplings are bad for the tummy.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: When it grows up, it becomes a goose.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: And that'll turn into a sheep.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: The sheep will turn into an ox.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: It was you who killed my son?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I had only one son, Chunsheng!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
- You're eating?
- Come on in, Mr. Niu.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
- Don't let me interrupt.
- We're finished.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Sounds too good. Will he go for Fengxia?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
He painted all the Chairman Maos
in our factory!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: In good times, we think of Chairman Mao.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
Nothing compares
to the Party's benevolence
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
Chairman Mao is dearer
than father and mother
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: There's nothing as good as socialism
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: No ocean as deep as class feeling
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
Maoist Thought
is revolution's treasure trove
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Whoever opposes it, we take as our enemy
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Come on, you can't cry today.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Sit with us for a bit.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Come as soon as the water's ready.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Chunsheng came to wish Fengxia well.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: You can't go on avoiding him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Can't we put this behind us?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: And will be better for your child.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Haven't had much to do with him for years.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: All my debts will have been paid.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Let's say we accept this money.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Keep it for us. There's plenty of time.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I know how difficult it must be...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: but you've got to pull through...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Erxi sent word from the hospital.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: She's in labor. We're on our way there.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Another working class member on the way!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: So we've got to get going.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: No, it's better if I wear it.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I'm just going to see him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I'll find a home for them when we get back.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: If I hadn't given Dr. Wang those buns...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: This box is bigger, isn't it?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: They'll have more room to run around.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: the chickens will turn into geese...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: and the geese will turn into sheep...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: and the sheep will turn into oxen.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Little Bun won't ride on an ox...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08
